comments:
I get an error on the java editor after i install JBossIDE plugin
I have installed Lomboz j2ee tools I also have jdt and junit installed

What is the error?
Do you have any information in your /workspace/.metadata/.log file?
Do you have reproducable steps to replicate the problem?

Comments from originator:

An error has occurred when creating this editor
 
is what i get i get it on eclipse 2.1.2 after i install jbosside and j2eetools 
and onmondo UML Plugin
as well as with eclipse3.0M5 with JDT 
actuall eclipse 3 does not pick up the plug ins easily
i will try and reinstall them and see and see which plug in precisely it errors on

-------------

I deleted the .metadata file and re-ran eclipse - 
then as i tried to set up a simple java class - it gave an error sayin it "could
not create part of it" and then wouldnt open it in the editor.
"An error has occurred when creating this editor"
 
the subsequent metafile is
